The [93mresulting[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mused[0m as [93mmacroinitiators[0m for [93mring[0m-[93mopening[0m [93mcopolymerization[0m of [93mlactide[0m and [93mglycolide[0m in the [93mpresence[0m of the [93m1[0m,[93m8[0m-[93mdiazabicyclo[0m[[93m5[0m.[93m4[0m.[93m0[0m][93mundec[0m-[93m7[0m-[93mene[0m ([93mDBU[0m) as a [93mcatalyst[0m in [93mdichloromethane[0m at [93mambient[0m [93mtemperature[0m. [93mTransesterification[0m and [93mformation[0m of [93mDBU[0m-[93minitiated[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mminimized[0m by [93moptimizing[0m the [93mcatalyst[0m [93mconcentration[0m. [93mThree[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [93msynthesized[0m in [93mvarious[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mweights[0m from [93m5000[0m [93mg[0m/[93mmol[0m to [93m33600[0m [93mg[0m/[93mmol[0m with [93mlow[0m [93mpolydispersity[0m. The [93mformation[0m of [93mwell[0m-[93mdefined[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mb[0m-[93mPLGA[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m was [93mfollowed[0m by [93mnuclear[0m [93mmagnetic[0m [93mresonance[0m [93mspectroscopy[0m and [93msize[0m-[93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m. [93mThermal[0m [93mproperties[0m of the [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [95minvestigated[0m by [93mthermal[0m [93mgravimetric[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mdifferential[0m [93mscanning[0m [93mcalorimetry[0m. The [93mmorphology[0m of the [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m was [95minvestigated[0m [93musing[0m [93msmall[0m-[93mangle[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mscattering[0m in the [93mbulk[0m and [93mvia[0m [93mgrazing[0m [93mincidence[0m [93msmall[0m-[93mangle[0m [93mX[0m-[93mray[0m [93mscattering[0m as [93mwell[0m as [93matomic[0m [93mforce[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m in [93mthin[0m [93mfilm[0m [93mdemonstrating[0m [93morganized[0m [93mnanostructures[0m with [93muniform[0m [93mdomain[0m [93msizes[0m. [93mOverall[0m, this [93mmanuscript[0m [93mdescribes[0m an [93mexpanded[0m [93mpolymer[0m [93mtoolbox[0m for [93mPLGA[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mpolymers[0m for [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93mlithography[0m [93mapplications[0m.
- “[93mOrganic[0m [93mChemistry[0m of [93mSulfur[0m”
- [93mCoordination[0m [93mchemistry[0m of [93morganometallic[0m or [93minorganic[0m [93mbinary[0m [93mgroup[0m [93m14[0m/[93m16[0m [93munits[0m [93mtowards[0m [93md[0m-[93mblock[0m and [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mmetal[0m [93matoms[0m
- [93mTheoretical[0m [93mstudy[0m of [93mCu[0m-[93mIIIA[0m [93mbinary[0m [93malloy[0m [93mcatalysts[0m for [93melectrochemical[0m [93mnitrate[0m [93mreduction[0m to [93mammonia[0m.: [93mElectrocatalytic[0m [93mreduction[0m of [93mnitrate[0m to [93mammonia[0m (NO [93m3[0m [93mRR[0m) [93mhas[0m [93memerged[0m as a [93mpromising[0m [93mapproach[0m for [93mwastewater[0m [93mpurification[0m and [93mNH[0m [93m3[0m [93melectrosynthesis[0m. [93mUnfortunately[0m, the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m of [93melectrocatalysts[0m is [93mhindered[0m by [93mpoor[0m [93mactivity[0m and [93mselectivity[0m for [93mpractical[0m [93mapplications[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mthree[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mCu[0m-[93mbased[0m [93malloys[0m, [93mcomposed[0m of [93mpost[0m-[93mtransition[0m [93mmetals[0m ([93mAl[0m, [93mGa[0m and In), were [95minvestigated[0m for the NO [93m3[0m [93mRR[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) [93mcalculations[0m, the [93mreaction[0m [91mpathways[0m for [93mthree[0m [93mcatalysts[0m [93malong[0m with [93mGibbs[0m [93mfree[0m [93menergy[0m [93mevolution[0m were [93midentified[0m, where [93menhanced[0m [93mactivity[0m was [93mobserved[0m in the [93msequence[0m of [93mAl[0m, [93mGa[0m and In with [93mlimiting[0m [93mpotentials[0m of -[93m0[0m.[93m77[0m [93mV[0m, -[93m0[0m.[93m21[0m [93mV[0m and -[93m0[0m.[93m18[0m [93mV[0m, [93mrespectively[0m. The [93mfavourable[0m [93mnitrate[0m [93mreduction[0m is [93mdue[0m to [93menhanced[0m [93melectronic[0m [93mdistribution[0m and [93mconductivity[0m. The [93mrelationship[0m between [93mnitrate[0m [93madsorption[0m and [93mlimiting[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m that [93mmoderate[0m [93mnitrate[0m [93madsorption[0m is [93massociated[0m with [93mhigher[0m [93mactivity[0m. In [93maddition[0m, the [93mproton[0m [93madsorption[0m and by-[93mproduct[0m [93mformation[0m ([93mN[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m) on [93mGa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m([93m100[0m) was [93mfound[0m to be [93mdifficult[0m, and [93mGa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m is [93midentified[0m as a [93mhighly[0m [93mefficient[0m [93malloy[0m [93mcatalyst[0m for the [93me[0m-NO [93m3[0m [93mRR[0m. [93mCu[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mbimetallic[0m [92msystems[0m with [93mexcellent[0m NO [93m3[0m [93mRR[0m [93mperformance[0m were [93mproposed[0m as [93mpromising[0m [93mcandidates[0m, [93mthus[0m [93mproviding[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93mrational[0m [92mdesign[0m of [93mnovel[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mmaterials[0m through the [93mp[0m-[93mblock[0m [93malloying[0m [93mstrategy[0m.
